course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Academic and Professional Development I
course.description: A compulsory, one year course for CIVL/CIEV/CIGBM students only. This course is designed to provide academic advising to students and/or to develop students' interpersonal skills in handling technical and non-technical issues in their professional careers. Graded P, PP or F.

reviews.author: Small__Potato
reviews.title: [勸世文] 若要生活好 梗係讀Civil
reviews.comment_content:
*This is not a review for CIVL1010 but some suggestion for students who want to pursue a career in Civil Engineering*

無論你係唔係真係想入CIVL major，都先恭喜你入到呢一個比上不足比下有餘嘅major。我覺得CIVL最大嘅特點就係佢夠平等。就算只有second low，只要你肯捱肯做，搵番civil related 嘅grad job又或者intern 相對上唔太難，至少人人都會有工開。除咗入client/govt之外, 入3A2M (Arup, AECOM, Atkins, Meinhardt, Mott Mac) 嘅 CGA>3.0 同緊緊碌到入港資consultant嘅second low 30歲之前嘅career path都係差唔多。對於唔想自己主動學嘢嘅人，civil 工唔會好似 computer science 要不斷鞭策自己學programming咁chur，亦都唔會中年失業。總言之civil對平庸嘅人唔差，不過對想闖一番事業，例如做 startup創科嘅人來講就未必咁適合。

- Pathway
對於想切靚個cv/學嘢嘅人可以參考吓以下嘅pathway，亦都會好粗略咁講吓啲civil course學咩：
Year 1 Fall/Spring:探索下自己適合邊一個major，如果想挑戰下自己可以趁Yr 1上莊，因為之後都要搵intern+讀書。

Year 1 summer: 如果唔識人嘅話都唔會搵到civil related嘅intern，我覺得都唔使特登嘥時間搵intern。可以去吓summer exchange/ voluntering ，兩樣做齊就最好。缺錢嘅話可以做吓ust 嗰啲行行企企嘅intern。未學車嘅話可以學車。作為大學生Hea左一個summer可以體驗少好多嘢，所以唔做以上嘅嘢都至少都應該讀少少course。

Year 2 Fall: 都尚算係輕鬆嘅一個sem，可以當識下朋友同體驗下civl course。想year 3 fall 去exchange嘅話應該今個sem留意email做準備，考IELTS。讀書方面，兩個數學course (math 2350, math 2011)對之後工作同讀書都完全冇用。civl 2160 將會係你學過最冇用嘅civl course。值得留意嘅係civl2110 statics，係DSE physics 嘅mechanics 嘅超進化版，你就算呢個sem學唔識statics你之後三年都會被迫學識，因為畫bending moment diagram同埋shear force diagram 係一個civil engineer必備嘅技能。

Year 2 winter: 只需要專注喺 industrial training 就得。唔少人都Hea上in train，因為作為一個engineer只會點工人做嘢，自己唔會郁手做。不過入邊學嘅扎鐵木工等等嘅知識就算對日常生活都好有用。

Year 2 Spring:開始黎料嘅一個sem。如果你想summer做intern嘅話就應該二月開始就搵intern。學術方面 civl 2170  同2160一樣咁冇用。2410學 env 嘢，唔做env嘅話應該係成世最後一個env course，不過作為civil engineer 都應該要識少少 env/waste。 2120 同2510 先係呢個sem嘅大佬。2510學嘅嘢應該係成個 curriculum 數一數二咁難，會為之後嘅3730打根基，不過你grad job唔做water嘅話其實唔識都冇咩所謂。2120 學嘅嘢好重要，係學點樣將2110 statics 啲嘢應用喺一個structural element上面，會為之後嘅3320 同 4320打根基。

Year 2 Summer: 試吓做第一份intern。不過就算成績叻嘅人，都好難搵到consultant intern。主要係搵contractor 又或者政府intern。政府intern出名學唔到野不過人工高，除非自己識搵嘢嚟做學野，否則唔係好缺錢嘅話都唔建議做。不過實際上>50%人都冇喺呢個sem做civil intern。去summer exchange又或者試吓Business/其他方面嘅intern都好。

Year 3 fall: 多數人會喺year 3 fall/Spring 去exchange。不過Spring 如果唔想靠department nomination 嘅話要自己搵 intern，所以我個人鍾意fall去exchange 多啲。留返喺ust讀書嘅話要讀4個都好重要嘅course。3510做水嘅話一定要識，interview water job 要溫呢個course，否則唔使識。2810 係我學得最開心嘅course，chris leung 教得真係好好。而且construction material 嘅知識無論係做 structural 又或者 geotech 都要識，喺日常生活都可以用到。3730 係 geotech 嘅第一個course，入邊樣樣內容都咁重要。3310 學嘅嘢理論上重要，亦都好難，不過事實上所有嘢都可以用 https://structural-analyser.com/計出來， exchange trans 到呢個course同埋3320都trans啦。

Year 3 Winter: 做intern。winter自己搵intern多數要靠關係，又或者department nomination。winter dept nom 多數會有Meinhardt同埋Gammon。 值得喺呢個sem用咗呢一個dept nom 嘅機會，因為summer比較易自己搵到intern ，再唔係summer都自己搵政府intern。

Year 3 Spring: Exchange/讀書/搵 intern。 3320 好恐怖，好多嘢學，好難，不過要識，最好嘗試自學concrete code。3740 interview 一定會問，衰就衰在 prof 好少refer geoguide。3210 ust 教嘅嘢好廢，不過係industry做嘢日日都會接觸到，建議自學NEC (new engineering contract)。3610 traffic 野，我覺得幾得意，不過搵traffic工來講 civil學生好難同 polyu Transportation Systems Engineering鬥。臨完sem嗰陣時要揀fyp topic。

Year 3 Summer: INTERN!!!!!!! 甚至會有人做兩份，做到九月尾。

Year 4 Fall: 開始搵grad job。CEG, Arup, AECOM都會喺9-10月就接受申請。11月會有ceg written test。 4950 Capstone 大家可以睇吓我喺UST space嘅review。fyp正常係fall sem都唔會做好多嘢，不過都要視乎TA/prof而定。elective 建議大家讀CIVL4320 - Structural Steel Design 同 CIVL 4700 - Engineering Geology。想做geotech 嘅話 CIVL 4710 Soil Slope Engineering 會學到slope/w，CIVL 4750 Numerical Solutions to Geotechnical Problems 學 PLAXIS 都好。

Year 4 Winter: 如果pass到ceg written test會係一月有interview，真係要溫書。

Year 4 Spring: 養老/做intern。CGA已經唔重要，因為搵工唔會show呢一個sem嘅成績。consultant/contractor 第一批interview會喺二月尾三月頭開始，之後陸陸續續都會有interview，去到六月七月都因為有人reject Offer所以繼續有interview同 offer。因為有人喺呢一個sem就已經讀完所有requirement，如果做intern嗰陣時識到人嘅話可以係呢個sem返去做intern/engineering assitant/assitant technical officer。如果唔做intern嘅話可以讀extra嘅elective，專心搵工，進入做工程狗前最後嘅養老生活。

（注：以上嘅pathway係作者幻想出嚟，實際上又做齊上莊，去summer & semseter exchange，做3-4份intern嘅人絕無僅有，一屆可能只有兩三個神人做得到。作者就完全唔得，如果知道有啲咁嘅人嘅話會佢當佢神咁拜。事實上只需要做兩份intern，又或者有一份真係學到野嘅intern，係interview就已經有唔小談資，presentable 啲甚至入到client。）
reviews.comment_teaching:
- HKU civil vs UST civil
唔少人因為dse分數唔夠入唔到HKU engine而入左ust engine。咁不過亦都有好多人鍾意UST個氣氛多啲。我覺得搵工來講UST average 嘅水平係爭HKU少少，ust 人嘅technical knowledge唔會差過hku，咁不過present同 scoial 嘅技巧就差少少，呢個亦都係政府同埋client最重視嘅能力。所以ust 會比較少人做client，不過consultant成日都見到我哋嘅師兄師姐。
另外ust啲prof 教嘅內容較少重視 code of practice，教嘅technical knowledge 較多係first principle。咁不過唔少人都自學，所以實際上又唔係同hku爭好遠。

- CIVL vs CIEV
我覺得 CIEV 嘅性價比都幾高，因為讀嘅嘢唔同少少就可以做env方面嘅工。雖然CIEV 搵 env方面嘅工比起讀env engg/ chem engg/ evmt 嘅人來講競爭力相對較弱，不過至少有資格做先。咁不過如果讀完ciev都係想做 civil/ geo/ str 嘅工，最好額外讀多幾個相關嘅electives。仲有係3210 同 3610 當中揀一個course，建議揀3210，因為3210 學嘅嘢實際上好廢，不過至少show到有construction management嘅知識，而且 3610 如果唔做Traffic planning嘅話真係冇咩用。

- Minor
好多人入civil其實唔係因為鍾意civil，純粹係因為前途好，grad 左一出嚟就二萬蚊人工，又唔使中年失業。所以會讀返佢鍾意嘅 field 嘅 minor。又會有人想轉行讀IT/business minor。讀minor 對見工亦都有少少着數，因為interviewer 問一式一樣嘅civil問題都問到悶，如果可以問吓你讀緊minor個範疇嘅問題，都會覺得有趣想知多啲。其實讀一個minor workload 上都還可以，因為你最後嗰個sem讀晒啲requirement會好得閒，只需要有兩三個 sem 18 credits，同讀一個Summer。不過最好year 1，最遲year 2就要plan。

- Exchange
雖然我成篇野都好academic focus，事實上去exchange會對cga (trans 走 3310 3320) 又或者搵工有幫助，咁不過 exchange絕對唔單止局限於學術野。去semseter exchange可以係一個唔同嘅地方生活半年，對個人成長，社交能力絕對有幫助。大家可以去 hkust study abroad 睇吓啲sharing report (https://studyabroad.ust.hk/outbound/resources/study-abroad-report-sharing)
UST去exchange嘅難度相比其他u易好多，因為我哋curriculum比較flexible，比較容易trans到Credit。credit transfer database可以喺 https://crtran.ust.hk/credit_instit 搵到。我見過有 civil 嘅人exchange 去英國，歐洲 (KTH, DTU)，新加坡 (NUS)。不過記得如果想去英國或者美國要考IELTS先。

- 點解要做 Intern?
我呢篇野成人都叫人做intern。實際上做intern有三個功用。
第一係grad job interview有野可以吹。因為我哋讀嘅course其實都差唔多，我哋同其他人最大嘅分別好多時就係intern。咁所以interviewer要分你同埋之前嗰個interviewee 邊個好啲就要靠intern。intern真係要學嘢，如果真係太Hea嘅話應interviewer一定會知，就會直接當你份intern冇到。
第二係可以知道你究竟想做啲咩。多數大學嘅 civil UG主要係設計比之後會做building structural 又或者geotech嘅人，做project management/ bridge/ water/ marine 嘅人實際上咗好多都係懵盛盛咁入咗去。其實好難叫一個淨係讀咗三年civil course嘅人決定佢之後40幾年做啲咩，只可以有兩三個月嘅intern 又或者問師兄先知道究竟邊一個範疇有多啲興趣或者好啲嘅前途。咁所以做嘅intern範疇越多越好，我覺得兩三份intern都係做同一範疇就唔係咁好。
第三係攞return offer。client, govt, 同 3A1M都唔會有return offer。不過細啲嘅consultant同埋唔少contractor 請graduate 都會優待做過佢哋intern嘅人，甚至有人會有return Offer。咁實際上做熟都好過做生嘅。

- CGA?
CGA 只會係hr screen cv嗰陣時有用，入到 interview之後可以直接無視你嘅cga。比較重要嘅cutoff 可能係first hon(3.5)/ 3.0/ second up (2.8)。如果佢cutoff 係3.0 就算爆4都冇咩特別優勢。所以只要achieve 到你想要嘅cutoff，cga就已經不再重要。與其追cga，不如返下intern，做吓課外活動，練下自己present技巧仲好。
reviews.comment_grading:
- Source
係科大讀書一定要有source，因為有唔少 assignment又或者 exam 都係直接copy又或者改少少past paper。同其他u要問師兄師姐攞source唔同，ust civil 仔嘅source主要係由ESU又或者civil soc提供。ESU 會有埋其他enginer major course 同埋common core 嘅 source ，只要join soc就會主動send俾你。civl soc source 就要問人先攞到同埋只有civil course，不過內容上會詳盡啲。當然有啲yr 4 elective course esu /civil soc  都冇source，咁就要問師兄師姐攞。
reviews.comment_workload:
- Workload
雖然civil嘅workload可能係細過computer Science，咁不過我哋都係chur。除咗要chur cga，其他人可能仲要搵intern，上莊，parttime。ust 整體氣氛亦少不免會同人地比較cga/cv，周街都係屈晒機嘅人。我覺得只要達成左自己定嘅目標其實就已經夠，冇可能亦都冇時間所有嘢都做到最好。

reviews.author: ljdjlalb
reviews.title: 土木(CIVL/CIEV)攻略
reviews.comment_content:
CIVL 好就唔算好，差又唔係，平實就係個最好形容詞。

(就業)
基本上正正常常都做得返本行。GPA 3以上咪入到mnc consultant/ clients ，低過3咪做contractor ，本質上做咩都冇分別都係呃呃氹氹為主，係consultant 考牌易d，講到尾都係睇你in個下偽裝得好唔好，不過係consultant design 點都個底好d。之後個Career path 主要睇你做邊範，做consultant 同 main con 晉升機會大d，始終個scale 大，做sub-con road maintenance就細d但都輕鬆d。

(Academic)
唔講太多可以睇返上一篇
-> 主要係year 3 fall 就可以reg electives，叻仔叻女可以早d讀
-> 有coding 嘅course 唔駛讀unless 你想做research／ai major 。都冇咩必要讀，土木工程只係需要識幾樣嘢 word ppt excel pdfx-changer
-> 有機會讀下相關electives學下 fem software e.g. slope/w, plaxis, etabs, sap2000, safe

(Skillset)
-> 9吹包裝好緊要，做耐左呢行就知道rather than civil engineering 其實係 9up engineering， 咩都係呃呃氹氹，你technical skill 曉飛都冇用，format 錯左阿sir 照彈返轉頭
-> technical skill 當然緊要，不過唔識都冇緊要，出到黎做野自然有excel spreadsheet 比你去計數，不過1 d concept 都冇阿sir 一問你d design assumption,methodology 就收皮
reviews.comment_teaching:
(CIVL verus CIEV)
(i) Workload
-> ENV workload 細過str geo tansport civl 是唔駛講的
(ii) Syllabus
-> 想做水嘅process designer pg 係必須的 ug 嘅Syllabus遠遠唔夠
-> 但係唔好以為做structural 唔駛讀master，好多有用course 都係taught master 先有，當然你都可以選擇ug 去sit ciem d堂
(iii) Teaching
-> Water treatment 就自求多福，自學為主的
Remarks: 想做sustainability, air quailty, carbon audit或者對water treatment 好有興趣，CIEV 都可以一戰的。其之係water treatment 上 env sci/evmt／chem eng 同ciev 比係冇可比性

(HKU vs HKUST)
-> Kong U 個 learning tree flexible 好多又快d
-> Str 人地勁過你
-> Geotech 睇你撞唔撞正張利民教授教個兩個pg course

(Elective selection)
-> Criterion: Practical, PRACTICAL and practical
-> 避開cas calculator 嘅 course，政府d阿sir 唔buy 新派野
-> FEM software courses are must to take
reviews.comment_grading:
(Grad job/intern)
(i) Reputation/culture on the Big consultant firm
           Arup >>> Aecom = Atkins = Mott = WSP >>> Meinhart
-> Arup: 學野最正統，但係人工出手最低，長做 not a option 最出名STR，不過其他唔差
-> Aecom: 最多job，包裝能力最強，以量取勝，technical capability正路
-> Atkins: technical capability正路，workload 正常d，出名geo
-> Mott: 學野黎差過arup 少少 workload 差唔多
-> WSP: 學野黎差過arup 少少，hea d，但入面做咩都冇得reference，唔似其他公司有得抄之前d report，導致好易比阿sir 彈返轉頭
-> Meinhart: Is similar to local firm
(ii) Intern experience
冇咩野會學到當儲cv

(Useful elective list for STR/Civil work)
- CIVL 4320 Structural Steel Design
- CIVL 4340 Prestressed Concrete Design
- CIVL 4370 Computer Methods of Structural Analysis
- CIVL 4380 Introduction to Wind Effects on Buildings and Structures
- CIVL 5370 Wind Effects on Buildings and Structures
- CIVL 5350 Bridge Engineering

(Useful elective list for GEO)
- CIVL 4700 Engineering Geology
- CIVL 4710 Soil Slope Engineering
- CIVL 4750 Numerical Solutions to Geotechnical Problems
- CIVL 4760 Introduction to Rock Mechanics
- CIVL 5720 Advanced Foundation Design
- CIVL 5760 Geotechnical Site Characterization

reviews.author: I Want 1st Hon!
reviews.title: Better take most of the photos in the seminars for easier "essay" writing!
reviews.comment_content:
1 year 0-credits compulsory course for CIVL/CIEV/CIGBM. Some may think it is bothersome, while some may agree that it is very useful.

Year 2 fall:
Attend the introduction session, 2 advising sessions (your CIVL advisor assigned in the introduction session), 2 seminars (need to write "Essay")

I personally don't think it is any kind of "essay", I think it is just answering simple questions, and it doesn't have word limit.

**Make sure you take most of the photos in the seminar, or ask your friends for the photos. You may easily answer the questions, and shorten the time for doing that!

For fall semester, the 2 seminars are:
1. Introduction to HKIE Student Chapter and YMS (October)
2. Introduction of HKIE and ICE, and the Role of a Civil Engineer (watching video in UST) (November)

And for spring semester, only 1 seminar is held in late March: Seminar on Innovation - by Chun Wo Construction Holdings Company Limited (with year 3 CIVL students)

The advising session is mainly for the major declaration and signature (CIVL or CIEV).
reviews.comment_teaching:
Year 2 Fall:
For the introduction, our CIVL department head (Lo Hong Kam) gave a short talk, and Jack Cheng introduced civil engineering and the study pattern, and introduced the scholarships from CIVL department. Some students were given scholarships! After that, we have time to talk to the advisor (randomly chosen) we were assigned, he/she might NOT be in your field of expertises, e.g. if you like environmental but he/she is from transportation.

Hence, two advising sessions in fall semester, just briefly talk to your professor. They may ask you more about your background, and introduce their fields. Remember, he/she is your advisor for three/four years (Year 2 to Year 4/5)! My advisor is very easy-going and patient, while the accent is just...TAT.

For the seminar, each year/seminar has different topics, dates, instructors. No comment on that.

Nothing special about spring semester...
reviews.comment_grading: Only Pass or Fail, you will be pre-registered to this course in year 2 fall! Attendance and essay questions (the submission date is more than 1 week) are just the key!
reviews.comment_workload:
Light Workload!

For Year 2 fall, just attend 1 introduction session, 2 seminars (with essays, 2 simple questions from ppt/pdf in class) & 2 advising sessions in fall semester!

For Year 2 spring, just attend 1 seminar (with 1-2 page essay) & 1 advising session!

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 聽talk既course
reviews.comment_content:
Year2 CIVL必修, 係一年course

Fall Term
1次compulsory talk
再聽3次talk
每次都係出面既工程師/在職既人講
每次都要寫一篇reflective essay
見advisor 2次

Spring Term
都係聽3次talk
每次都係出面既工程師/在職既人講
每次都要寫一篇reflective essay
見advisor 2次
reviews.comment_teaching:
D talk都係講行內既野
好多人問問題成日overrun
無興趣既話進入AFK模式就得

reviews.author: Watermelon
reviews.comment_content:
一個了解CIVIL行業嘅course。

一個sem會有2個HKIE 嘅 talk要去聽。

Fall Sem:
- What do you think about the future development of Hong Kong in the coming 10 years? Please name a few projects for illustration.
- Which attribute do civil engineers need amongst different roles in the industry?
- How does YMS facilitate connection between students and industry?
- How is the contractor sector different from others?

Spring Sem:
- Name three most common construction materials being used in the civil engineering industry in Hong Kong today, and explain their different functions/engineering properties for different construction purposes
- Can one be chartered as a Material Engineer under HKIE? What are the requirements, and is/are there any difference(s) compared with the route of being a ‘Civil Engineer’?
- What are the major duty and role of environmental engineers in a civil engineering project?
- What are the existing routes for being a charted environmental engineer in HKIE? Is/are there any difference(s) compared to the case of civil engineer?
reviews.comment_teaching: 每一個talk都超悶，不過要知道有啲point要寫落reflection essay
reviews.comment_workload:
一個sem聽2個talk (6點後，去到真係想瞓覺)

寫2份essay (1-2 page)
